description: MvvmForms is Dual License. For Open Source Projects under GPL, for evaluation purposes, for personal, non-commercial purpose, for academic purpose it's free. For propriety, commercial projects it is also free, but without any support or guarantees. For a supported version, please contact mvvmforms@activedevelop.de for information how to obtain per-developer licenses with included support options.
releaseNotes:
New in V2.1.1:

* Changes in the license: In addition to the GPL, the commercial license of MvvmForms is also free, but without support or guarantees. Supported versions are available.
* Introducing MvvmComponent Quick Task SmartTag for browsing and editing a View's Controls Tree at a glance.
* Introducing of Binding Report/Printing for View (using MvvmComponant's SmartTag).
* Fixed IsDirty-Handling in PropertyAssignment when using in Quick Task Tags.
* Adjusted Property Bindings Dialog.
* Introducing setting for exception handling with the static BindingManager.ThrowExceptionOnUnassignableBindingProperties property.
* Introducing BindableTreeView, which add to the list of special MvvmControls: 
  MvvmDataGrid
  CommandButton
  BindableTreeView.

To populate the toolbox:

* Change Framework for WinForms Project to 4.5.1
* Compile Solution
* Find bin folder of compiled Windows Forms Project
* Make sure, both 'ActiveDevelop.EntitiesFormsLib.dll' and 'MvvmBaseLib.dll' got deployed in bin folder!!
* Drag 'ActiveDevelop.EntityFormsLib.Dll' into Visual Studio Toolbox.

For further information see ChangeLog and readme.md.
title: MvvmForms
